name: Runescape
description: List of key shortcuts for Runescape, a fantasy MMORPG developed and published by Jagex.

Shortcuts.val: When held down and the mouse is clicked on the main screen or in the Minimap window, Run is turned on for that movement only.
Close the quick chat dialogue box and return to the regular game messages.
Used in the bank interface to load the corresponding quick preset from your bank.
Used in the bank interface to deposit inventory, equipped items and BOB inventory respectively.
Used in character dialogue to choose a response.
Used in the Make X interface to continue with the default settings or in character dialogue to continue.
Can be used in place of clicking Yes/No for the destroy interface.
